mutants.original_line: b.sort(reverse=True)  # Sort in descending order to get the largest elements first
mutants.code:
def find_optimal_subsequence(n, a, m, requests):
    results = []
    for (k, pos) in requests:
        b = a[:]
        b.sort(reverse=False)
        optimal_subseq = b[:k]
        optimal_subseq.sort()
        results.append(optimal_subseq[pos - 1])
    return results

mutants.original_line: results.append(optimal_subseq[pos - 1])  # Append the element at position pos-1

mutants.code:
def find_optimal_subsequence(n, a, m, requests):
    results = []
    for (k, pos) in requests:
        b = a[:]
        b.sort(reverse=True)
        optimal_subseq = b[:k]
        optimal_subseq.sort()
        results.append(optimal_subseq[pos - -1])
    return results
